front.title: ISIS Protocol Extensions for Boundary Node Discovery (BND)

abstract.t: There are various circumstances where it is highly desirable to be able to dynamically and automatically discover a set of Boundary Nodes (BN) along with their domain information. For that purpose, this document defines extensions to the Intermediate System to Intermediate System(IS-IS) routing protocol for the advertisement of Boundary Node (BN)Discovery information within an IS-IS area or within the entire IS-IS routing domain.
